job.title: Technical Architect
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongCustomer Success Groupstrong Job Details brbrstrongstronguWhat Youll Be DoingbrbrustrongThe Professional Services Delivery team are the postsales implementers of Tableau solutions and therefore highly customerfacing The strongTechnical Architect TAstrong is a Lead in the Professional Services Delivery team At this level it is expected that the incumbent will be an experienced ConsultantArchitect and proficient at endtoend Solution Architecture and Customer Engagement In this role the incumbent will be expected to spend more than 70 of their time onsite with customers or working on customerassigned workbrbrWithin the Professional Services team the TA will be highly skilled in Tableauadjacent technologies that help Tableau integrate in a complex customer deployment Being a leadership role the incumbent will regularly be the first to deploy a new offering and then enable others on the team to do sobrbrA key aspect of Consulting at Tableau is nurturing customers to drive adoption and repeat purchases The TA is responsible for guiding the engagement to enable those objectives and providing feedback to the Sales teams about future opportunitiesbrbrstrongSome of the things youll be doing include brstrongulli Become an expert in the features benefits and application of Tableaus products  Deep understanding of our Server products and its integration into client solutions and an intermediate level understanding of our Desktopfrontend products lili Conduct needs analysis data reviews and product demonstrations lili Become an expert in Tableau APIs and how to use them to provide solutions to customer issues lili Conduct discovery exercises build detailed implementation plans and coordinate the delivery of the solution lili Communicate via phone email facetoface and web meetings with customers assisting and guiding them through the proposal and implementation process lili Generate PreEngagements Brief and Post Engagement Summaries for customers lili Provide adhoc onsite customer training and professional services lili Provide billable Professional Services to Tableau customers lili Assist Professional Services Management and Sales with specific scoping or technical  guidance in presales discussions lili Help identify trends training needs and new programs  services lili Provide a broader appreciation of business issues and translate more complex customer requirements into achievable Tableau technical solutions that fall outside of native functionalities lili Build and maintain a library of reusable Service Delivery documentation and code to include custom scripts and coding lili Participate in or lead ad hoc side projects for the benefit of the worldwide Services Delivery organization lili Mentor  coach other consultants brliulstronguWho You ArebrustrongulliExperienced  Relevant experience in Consulting or Professional Services Delivery role in related industry liliCommunication Finesse Strong verbal and written communication of qualitative and quantitative business cases liliTechnically Savvy  You have strong technical skills across various technologies amp impeccable business acumen Knowledge of databases warehouses business intelligence systems and data analysis tools Experience in SQL SAML network troubleshooting AWSAzureGoogle Cloud as well as architecting missioncritical systems for high availability failover disaster recovery and redundancy Security hardening or application development skills in Python andor JavaScript are also desirable liliEye for Detail Exercise timely practice of attention to detail through thorough and accurate assessment to better understand cause and effect liliAnalytical Problem Solver Ability to define identify and resolve problems with varying degrees of complexity liliYou are a Recruiter Tableau hires company builders and in this role you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world brliulemFor Coloradobased roles Minimum annual salary of 12180000 You may also be offered incentive compensation bonus restricted stock units and benefits More details about our company benefits can be found at the following link em em httpswwwgetsalesforcebenefitscom brbremstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbruSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with uSalesforcecomu or uSalesforceorgu brbrSalesforce welcomes allbrbr
